resources.string: Welcome to the Video Game Request Forum
This forum is for people that want to share ideas or concepts on a video game that could be developed. Once a request forum is completed, it will be sent to a gaming studio the person chose
Enter your first and last name
Here is a list of Gaming Companies that you may recognize:
Enter the Game Company that you know of or is your favorite
Write down the type of game you want, such it\'s genre and the franchise you want it to be apart of
Write down the details of what your game should like, such as designs, environment, characters, and gameplay functionality

Thank you for sharing your video game concepts and completing this forum. Your video game request, including your email and name, has been to sent to the video game you chose. They will take a look at your ideas. Click the "Go Back" button if you want to fill out another video game request forum
